scripts.postinstall: concurrently "cd backend && npm i" "cd client && npm i"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd backend && npm run start" "cd client && npm run build"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.eslint: concurrently "cd backend && npm run lint" "cd client && npm run lint"
scripts.eslint-fix: concurrently "cd backend && npm run lint-fix" "cd client && npm run lint-fix"
